data.title: Selected Shorts: April Antics: Fictions & Foolery
data.meta_description: The popular radio show and podcast Selected Shorts returns for their annual spring fling with some of the nation’s best stage and screen actors. The programs include everything from light farce to biting satire, as well as some rich, reflective tales of everyday human folly. And Beyoncé performs a musical half-time show as humorist Mark Twain—okay, we couldn’t resist getting started early—April Fool’s! Hosted by Jane Kaczmarek. Tickets $20.
data.meta_site_name: The J. Paul Getty in Los Angeles
data.text:
Selected Shorts

GETTY CENTER

Harold M. Williams Auditorium

The popular radio show and podcast Selected Shorts returns for their annual spring fling with some of the nation's best stage and screen actors. The programs include everything from light farce to biting satire, as well as some rich, reflective tales of everyday human folly. And Beyoncé performs a musical half-time show as humorist Mark Twain—okay, we couldn't resist getting started early—April Fool's! Hosted by Jane Kaczmarek. Tickets $20.
